data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Galați, Romania.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Galați, Romania

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Galați, Romania.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 43 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Galați, Romania.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 436,369 people in the state of Galați who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Galați.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tatar, Crimean people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help every believer in Galați, Romania be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 31,629 believers in the state of Galați into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.section_summary:
the state of Galați, Romania has a population of 499,700.

We estimate Galați has 31,629 people who might know Jesus, 436,369 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 31,702 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Galați that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
